name: Orbit Defender (itch) (MrH115 - Fontty)
description:
Story

Orbit Defender is an endless arcade shooter where you need to defend your planet from the onslaught of planet devouring alien bird creatures.

Details
  • 1280 * 720 Resolution
  • Endless
  • Early Concept
  • Pixel Art
  • Made With MonoGame
Gameplay

Aim with the mouse and left click to shoot an electric dart to capture the creature for scientific experiment.

each creature you capture gives you Credits and raises your score.

You can upgrade the maximum amount of darts you carry by spending your hard earned Credits.

UFOs will appear randomly appear, you must shoot the red UFO before it flees while avoiding the blue UFO until it passes.

In the main menu, press Q to spend you credits and increase the maximum number of darts you can carry. 

Or press W to increase the value of each bird you capture(More Credits per Capture).
